data.meta_description:
Torches (Las antorchas), Leopoldo Méndez (Mexico, Mexico City, 1902-1969) La Estampa Mexicana (Mexico, Mexico City), Mexico, Mexico City, 1947, published 1948, Prints, Linocut,

This linocut belongs to a suite of ten prints that Leopoldo Méndez created for the film Río Escondido (Hidden River), directed by Emilio Fernández (1904–1986) and shot by Gabriel Figueroa (1907–1997)—two greats of the Golden Age of Mexican cinema.
